JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Senior Operations Engineer - Trifork Security (Aalborg)

Do you thrive in the dynamic world of Infrastructure? Are you passionate about building and maintaining robust and secure IT infrastructure? Trifork Security is seeking a skilled and motivated Senior Operations Engineer to join our team in Aalborg.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Manage and maintain our operational platforms, including Proxmox, Splunk, and local cloud infrastructure.

  • Ensure the availability, performance, and security of critical IT services.

  • Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues.

  • Implement and maintain security best practices.

  • Collaborate with other teams to support security operations.

Qualifications:

  • Senior-level expertise in operating systems (Primarily Linux, and some Windows), virtualization (Proxmox), and cloud technologies.

  • Experience with supporting services (Networking, IPv6, DNS, VPN, HAProxy, SAML, SSO etc.).

  • Excellent troubleshooting and problem-solving skills.

  • Strong documentation, communication and collaboration skills.

Advantages:

  • ITIL knowledge and/or certification

  • Experience with security services (SIEM, EDR/XDR/NDR, Micro Segmentation etc.).

  • Familiarity with Jira/Confluence Atlassian tools

  • Knowledge of vulnerability management principles and practices.

  • Splunk knowledge (administration, configuration, optimization).

  • Knowledge of Fortinet, Proxmox, Minio, Illumio, Kasm, Python, Ansible and databases like Postgresql, MongoDB

We offer:

As part of our team, you will enjoy a range of attractive employee benefits, including breakfast and lunch, a MacBook & iPhone, paid internet, health and dental insurance, a competitive pension plan, and an active staff association that emphasizes social interactions, enjoyment, and competitions.

If you have any questions, please contact:

Philip Lyngø

CISO/Operational Manager

ply@trifork.security

Phone: 7777 0866
